questions:
What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) Trees and plants
B) People interacting
C) Carved pumpkins
D) Artwork on display

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A carved pumpkin
D) A painting

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A crowd of people
C) A dark space
D) A wall with paintings

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Flowers
B) A person
C) Two carved pumpkins
D) An animal

What kind of lighting is used in the photo?
A) Natural sunlight
B) Fluorescent light
C) Candlelight & LED light inside the pumpkins
D) Streetlights

How many pumpkins are there in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the color of the pumpkins in the photo?
A) Green
B) Orange and white
C) Yellow
D) Red

What is the shape of the carvings on the pumpkins?
A) Geometric patterns
B) Faces
C) Animals
D) Abstract designs

What is the primary light source in the photo?
A) Sunlight
B) Electric lights
C) Candlelight inside the pumpkins
D) Flashlight

What is the material used to create the decorations in the photo?
A) Paper
B) Plastic
C) Pumpkins
D) Wood

What detail is highlighted by the lighting in the photo?
A) The background
B) The carvings on the pumpkins
C) The floor
D) The ceiling

What is the artistic technique used in the photo?
A) Painting
B) Carving
C) Drawing
D) Sculpting

What is the focal point of the photo?
A) The background
B) The lighting
C) The carved faces on the pumpkins and light inside the pumpkins
D) The floor

What is the purpose of the lighting in the photo?
A) To highlight the background
B) To create shadows
C) To illuminate the carvings
D) To brighten the entire scene

What is the main activity depicted in the photo?
A) Carving pumpkins
B) Displaying carved pumpkins
C) Selling pumpkins
D) Cooking with pumpkins

What is the relationship between the light and the pumpkins in the photo?
A) The light is coming from above
B) The light is coming from inside the pumpkins
C) The light is coming from the side
D) The light is coming from behind

What is the most striking feature of the pumpkins in the photo?
A) Their color
B) Their size
C) Their carvings
D) Their placement

What is the main contrast in the photo?
A) Light and dark
B) Colorful and dull
C) Big and small
D) Smooth and rough

What is the primary element in the foreground of the photo?
A) Flowers
B) People
C) Carved pumpkins
D) Animals

What is the significance of the light inside the pumpkins?
A) It creates a warm atmosphere
B) It highlights the carvings
C) It makes the pumpkins look bigger
D) It changes the color of the pumpkins

What is the primary color of the pumpkin on the left?
A) Green
B) White
C) Orange
D) Yellow

What is the main visual effect created by the photo?
A) A sense of movement
B) A sense of depth
C) A sense of eeriness
D) A sense of joy

What is the lighting situation in the photo?
A) Bright daylight
B) Dim and dark, with internal lighting in the pumpkins
C) Fluorescent indoor lighting
D) Street lighting
